import React from "react"; import './testimonial.css' import {Col, Container, Row} from "reactstrap"; import Slider from 'react-slick' const Testimonial = () => { const settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 3000, swipeToSlide: true } return (

) } export default Testimonial
